20101215161423.857|20101215161425.286|CCO|>> WHEN THE TEMPERATURE DROPS, 
20101215161425.286|20101215161426.714|CCO|SO DOES YOUR PRESSURE IN THE 
20101215161426.714|20101215161428.143|CCO|TIRES.
20101215161428.143|20101215161429.571|CCO|EVERY TEN DEGREES IT GOES DOWN 
20101215161429.571|20101215161431.000|CCO|ABOUT 1.
20101215161431.000|20101215161433.000|CCO|IF YOU HAVEN'T CHECKED THEM FOR 
20101215161433.000|20101215161435.000|CCO|A WHILE, THEY ARE LOW.
20101215161435.000|20101215161437.000|CCO|IT'S EASY TO CHECK THEM.
20101215161437.000|20101215161439.000|CCO|TIRE PRESSURE GAUGE, GO OVER IT 
20101215161439.000|20101215161441.000|CCO|AND SEE WHAT THEY ARE AT.
20101215161441.000|20101215161443.000|CCO|USE A DIGITAL GAUGE, SET THEM TO

20101215161445.000|20101215161447.000|CCO|IF YOU LOOK AT THE TIRE, TELLS 
20101215161447.000|20101215161449.000|CCO|YOU THEY ARE LOW ON PRESSURE. 
20101215161449.000|20101215161451.000|CCO|>> WHAT ABOUT THE TREAD?
20101215161451.000|20101215161452.429|CCO|>> MAKE SURE YOU HAVE TREAD.
20101215161452.429|20101215161453.857|CCO|YOU COULD BE DRIVING AROUND IN 
20101215161453.857|20101215161455.286|CCO|THE SUMMER AND THEY'LL BE FINE 
20101215161455.286|20101215161456.714|CCO|BUT ALL SORT OF SLICK CONDITIONS
20101215161456.714|20101215161458.143|CCO|THEY ARE NOT GOING TO WORK. 
20101215161458.143|20101215161459.571|CCO|>> DO YOU HAVE TO HAVE WINTER
